title: Wasantha Handapangoda passes away in London
byline: Wasantha Handapangoda, President of the Sri Lanka Podujana Education Services Union, has passed away.

title: New gazette issued for Aswesuma Welfare Payments from January
byline: A new Gazette Extraordinary has been issued, outlining the procedure for the payment of monthly benefit allowances to eligible families and individuals under the Aswesuma Welfare Benefit Payment Scheme, effective from January 2025.

title: Man killed, wife injured in Wellawa shooting
byline: A 32-year-old man was killed and his wife injured in a shooting incident at Maraluwawa, Wellawa, last night.

title: Govt yet to decide on future of Chief of Defence Staff post
byline: The government has yet to decide whether to abolish or retain the position of Chief of Defence Staff (CDS) following the conclusion of the current CDS, General Shavendra Silvaâ€™s tenure.
